page.title: 09Shopping near to Tavistock
page.content: Our most populated areas are Chilsworthy and Latchley, two small villages which are surrounded by bigger towns and villages. To the north is{ Launceston,}a castle town, approximately 20 kilometres by road. To the south lies the {city of {Plymouth}which is some 24 km by road but only 13 km as the crow flies.To the west is{Callington,}6 km, and to the east is{Tavistock,}a distance of 8 km. The{majority of people}who took part in a survey, shop in{Tavistock, {Devon,}although this is closely followed by those taking advantage of the facilities offered by{Callington. Launceston doesn't seem to attract the custom from the survey area. Very few seem to shop locally and although Plymouth is a very big shopping centre, very few seem to go there on a regular basis.
